insertCustomer: insert into Customers.Customers (name, email, password, state) values ($1, $2, $3, 'a')
insertCustomerRegistrations: insert into Customers.Customer_Registrations(comfirmation_code, name, email, password) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)
selectCustomerRegistrations: select * from Customers.Customer_Registrations where email = $1 and comfirmation_code = $2
deleteExpiredCustomerRegistrations: delete from Customers.Customer_Registrations where created_at < now() - interval '1 day'
